title: Autumn Awakening (and Garden Graveyard!): Preparing for Cool-Season Planting

tasks.task: Performing general garden cleanup tasks during autumn.
subtasks: Cutting dead parts off the mint plant.
Identifying and checking the health of strawberry plants, trimming them back.
Removing eggplant from the garden bed and assessing the bed's nutrient content.
Obtaining carrot seeds for replanting in the vacated eggplant bed.
Preparing a bed for beetroot by mixing in piggy post and earthworm castings.
Planting beetroot seeds in the prepared bed.
Collecting garlic chive seeds for propagation.
Planting a black pepper tree in a pot, ensuring not to disturb its roots.
Mixing piggy post into another bed for future planting.
Overseeding the bed with beetroot and basil.
Checking the mushroom growing environment and considering future cultivation.
